K10sf258_sc:wal2_2_0: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān upaseno rājagṛhe viharati śītavane śmaśāne sarpaśauṇḍikaprāgbhāre kaliṁkopavicārāntarikāyām |
K10sf258_sc:wal2_3_0: athāyuṣmata upasenasya ekākino rahasigatasya pratisaṁlīnasya āśīviṣaḥ kāye nipatita uggratejā ghoraviṣaḥ parittas tadyathā āṁjanaśalākā |
K10sf258_sc:wal2_4_0: tatrāyuṣmān upaseno bhikṣūn āmaṁtrayati | āśīviṣo me kāye nipatitaḥ tadyathā āṁjanaśalākā |
K10sf258_sc:wal2_4_1: aṁga tāvan me āyuṣmantaḥ kāyaṁ samaṁtato ’nuparigṛhya bahir abhinirharata mā ihaiva
K10sf258_sc:wal2_5_0: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmata upasenasya nātidūre niṣaṇṇo ’bhūd anyataram vṛkṣamūlaṁ niśritya |
K10sf258_sc:wal2_6_0: aśrauṣīd āyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmata upasenasya vāgvyāhāram | śrutvā ca punar yenāyuṣmān upasenas tenopajagāma | upetyāyuṣmantam upasenam idam avocat |
K10sf258_sc:wal2_7_0: na khalu vayam āyuṣmata upasenasya paśyāmo mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā
K10sf258_sc:wal2_7_1: nānākaraṇam | atha ca punar āyuṣmān upasena evam āha | āśīviṣo me kāye nipatitaḥ
K10sf258_sc:wal2_8_0: yasyāyuṣmāñ śariputra evaṁ syāt | ahaṁ cakṣur mama cakṣuḥ | ahaṁ śrottaṁ ghrāṇaṁ
K10sf258_sc:wal2_8_1: jihvā kāyaḥ | ahaṁ manaḥ | mama manaḥ | ahaṁ rūpaṁ mama rūpam | ahaṁ śabdagandharasaspṛṣṭavyadharmā
K10sf258_sc:wal2_8_2: mama dharmāḥ | ahaṁ pṛthivīdhātur mama pṛthivīdhātuḥ | aham abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur
K10sf258_sc:wal2_8_3: ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuḥ | ahaṁ rūpaskandho mama rūpaskandhaḥ | ahaṁ vedanāsaṁjñāsaṁskāravijñānaskandho
K10sf258_sc:wal2_8_4: mama vijñānaskandhaḥ | tasya syād mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraṇam |
K10sf258_sc:wal2_9_0: mama tu naivaṁ bhavati | ahaṁ cakṣur mama cakṣuḥ | tadyathā ahaṁ vijñānaskandho mama vijñānaskandhaḥ | tasya me kiṁ bhaviṣyati mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraṇam |
K10sf258_sc:wal10_1: prahīṇāḥ parijñātā ucchinnamūlās tālamastakavad anābhavagatikā āyatyām anutpādadharmāṇaḥ |

K10sf258_sc:wal11_0: athāyuṣmāñ śariputtraḥ āyuṣmata upasenasya kāyaṁ sāmantakenānuparigṛhya bahir abhinirharati |
K10sf258_sc:wal12_0: samanantarābhinirhṛta āyuṣmata upasenasya kāyaḥ śataśo viśirṇas tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ |
K10sf258_sc:wal16_1: ādīptād vā gṛhād mukto maraṇānte na śocate ||
K10sf258_sc:wal18_0: athāyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmata upasenasya śarīre śāripūjāṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṁs tenopajagāma upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvā ekāṁte nyaṣīdat |
K10sf258_sc:wal19_0: ekāṁtaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmāñ śāriputtro bhagavaṁtam idam avocat |
K10sf258_sc:wal20_0: āyuṣmato bhadaṁta upasenasya āśīviṣaḥ kāye nipatita ugratejā ghoraviṣaḥ parittas tadyathāṁ janaśalākā pūrvavad yāvat tasya kāyo viśīrṇas tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ |
K10sf258_sc:wal21_0: sacec chāriputra upasenasya kulaputtrasya tasmiṁ samaye imā gāthāḥ pratyabhāsyaṁta imāni ca maṁtrapadāni nāsyāśīviṣaḥ kāye ’kramiṣyan nāsya kāyo viśariṣyat tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ |
K10sf258_sc:wal22_0: yā bhadaṁta katamā gāthāḥ katamāni maṁtrapadāni ||

K10sf258_sc:wal33_0: sacec chāriputtra upasenasya kulaputrasya tasmiṁ samaye imā gāthāḥ pratyabhāyaṁta imāni ca maṁtrapadāni nāsyāśīviṣaṁ kāye ’kramiṣyat | nāsya kāyo vyaśariṣyat tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ |
K10sf258_sc:wal34_0: tat kuta etad bhadaṁta labhyam āyuṣmata upasenena yat tasmiṁ samaye aśrutapūrvvā gāthāḥ pratibhāṣyaṁte aśrutapūrvvāṇi vā maṁtrapadāni tadyathā etarhi bhagavataḥ |
K10sf258_sc:wal35_0: athāyuṣmāñ śāriputtro bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavatpādau śirasā bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāṁtaḥ ||
